mapper.insert: insert into B_G2_011 (ID, DPRTCODE, JX, WXFABH, BB, ZWMS, JH_SXRQ, SJ_SXRQ, BZ, ZXBS, F_BBID, B_BBID, ZT, ZDBMID, ZDRID, ZDSJ, SHBMID, SHRID, SHSJ, SHYJ, PFBMID, PFRID, PFSJ, PFYJ, SXBMID, SXRID, SXSJ, PFJL, SHJL, GBYJ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zdbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pfjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gbyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update B_G2_011
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JX = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WXFABH = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BB = #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZWMS = #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JH_SXRQ = trunc(#{jhSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),
SJ_SXRQ = trunc(#{sjSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
F_BBID = #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
B_BBID = #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZDBMID = #{zdbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDRID = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDSJ = #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHSJ = #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHYJ = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFBMID = #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFRID = #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFSJ = #{pfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PFYJ = #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXBMID = #{sxbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXRID = #{sxrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXSJ = #{sxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PFJL = #{pfjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHJL = #{shjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GBYJ = #{gbyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_G2_011 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JX = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WXFABH = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BB = #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZWMS = #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH_SXRQ = #{jhSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJ_SXRQ = #{sjSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, F_BBID = #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, B_BBID = #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZDBMID = #{zdbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDRID = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDSJ = #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHSJ = #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHYJ = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFBMID = #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFRID = #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFSJ = #{pfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PFYJ = #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXBMID = #{sxbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXRID = #{sxrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXSJ = #{sxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PFJL = #{pfjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SHJL = #{shjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GBYJ = #{gbyj,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from B_G2_011 b1 left join t_user zdr on b1.zdrid = zdr.id left join t_user shr on b1.shrid = shr.id left join t_user pfr on b1.pfrid = pfr.id left join t_user sxr on b1.sxrid = sxr.id left join b_g_003 b2 on b1.id = b2.zlid left join b_g2_001 b3 on b2.pgdid = b3.id where b1.jx = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by b1.bb desc, b3.pgdh

select
from B_G2_011 where jx = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and zxbs = 1

select
from B_G2_011 b1 left join t_user zdr on b1.zdrid = zdr.id left join t_user shr on b1.shrid = shr.id left join t_user pfr on b1.pfrid = pfr.id left join t_user sxr on b1.sxrid = sxr.id left join b_g_003 b2 on b1.id = b2.zlid left join b_g2_001 b3 on b2.pgdid = b3.id where b1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b1.zt = 2
order by b1.jx, b3.pgdh

select
from B_G2_011 b1 left join t_user zdr on b1.zdrid = zdr.id left join t_user shr on b1.shrid = shr.id left join t_user pfr on b1.pfrid = pfr.id left join t_user sxr on b1.sxrid = sxr.id left join b_g_003 b2 on b1.id = b2.zlid left join b_g2_001 b3 on b2.pgdid = b3.id where b1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b1.zt = 3
order by b1.jx, b3.pgdh

select
from B_G2_011 b1 left join t_user zdr on b1.zdrid = zdr.id left join t_user shr on b1.shrid = shr.id left join t_user pfr on b1.pfrid = pfr.id left join t_user sxr on b1.sxrid = sxr.id left join b_g_003 b2 on b1.id = b2.zlid left join b_g2_001 b3 on b2.pgdid = b3.id where b1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b1.zt = 7
order by b1.jx, b3.pgdh

sql.if: and exists (select 1 from v_role_jx a where a.dprtcode = b1.dprtcode and a.fjjx = b1.jx and a.user_id = #{paramsMap.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM B_G2_011 B1 INNER JOIN B_G2_012 B2 ON B1.JX = B2.JX AND B1.WXFABH = B2.WXFABH AND B1.DPRTCODE = B2.DPRTCODE AND B1.BB = B2.BB WHERE B1.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT B0.ID, B0.DPRTCODE, B0.JX, B0.WXFABH, B0.BB, B0.ZWMS, B0.JH_SXRQ, B0.SJ_SXRQ, B0.BZ, B0.ZXBS, B0.F_BBID, B0.B_BBID, B0.ZT, B0.ZDBMID, B0.ZDRID, B0.ZDSJ, B0.SHBMID, B0.SHRID, B0.SHSJ, B0.SHYJ, B0.PFBMID, B0.PFRID, B0.PFSJ, B0.PFYJ, B0.SXBMID, B0.SXRID, B0.SXSJ, B0.PFJL, B0.SHJL, B0.GBYJ, B1.ID AS B1ID, B1.DPRTCODE AS B1DPRTCODE, B1.JX AS B1JX, B1.WXFABH AS B1WXFABH, B1.WXXMDLID AS B1WXXMDLID, B1.WXXMLX AS B1WXXMLX, B1.ZJH AS B1ZJH, B1.RWH AS B1RWH, B1.BB AS B1BB, B1.CKH AS B1CKH, B1.RWMS AS B1RWMS, B1.SYX AS B1SYX, B1.CKWJ AS B1CKWJ, B1.GZLX AS B1GZLX, B1.XMLX AS B1XMLX, B1.IS_BJ AS B1IS_BJ, B1.ALI AS B1ALI, B1.JHGS_RS AS B1JHGS_RS, B1.JHGS_XSS AS B1JHGS_XSS, B1.GKBH AS B1GKBH, B1.JSGS AS B1JSGS, B1.IS_HDWZ AS B1IS_HDWZ, B1.BZ AS B1BZ, B1.ZT AS B1ZT, B1.F_BBID AS B1F_BBID, B1.B_BBID AS B1B_BBID, B1.ZDBMID AS B1ZDBMID, B1.ZDRID AS B1ZDRID, B1.ZDSJ AS B1ZDSJ, B1.YXBS AS B1YXBS, B1.EOBH AS B1EOBH, D1.ZJH AS D1ZJH,D1.ZWMS AS D1ZWMS,D1.YWMS AS D1YWMS FROM B_G2_011 B0 LEFT JOIN B_G2_01102 S1 ON B0.ID = S1.MAINID LEFT JOIN B_G2_012 B1 ON S1.WXXMID = B1.ID LEFT JOIN D_005 D1 ON B1.ZJH = D1.ZJH AND B1.DPRTCODE = D1.DPRTCODE AND D1.ZT = 1 WHERE B0.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY D1.ZJH, B1.RWH

SELECT B0.ID, B0.DPRTCODE, B0.JX, B0.WXFABH, B0.BB, B0.ZWMS, B0.JH_SXRQ, B0.SJ_SXRQ, B0.BZ, B0.ZXBS, B0.F_BBID, B0.B_BBID, B0.ZT, B0.ZDBMID, B0.ZDRID, B0.ZDSJ, B0.SHBMID, B0.SHRID, B0.SHSJ, B0.SHYJ, B0.PFBMID, B0.PFRID, B0.PFSJ, B0.PFYJ, B0.SXBMID, B0.SXRID, B0.SXSJ, B0.PFJL, B0.SHJL, B0.GBYJ, B1.ID AS B1ID, B1.DPRTCODE AS B1DPRTCODE, B1.JX AS B1JX, B1.WXFABH AS B1WXFABH, B1.WXXMDLID AS B1WXXMDLID, B1.WXXMLX AS B1WXXMLX, B1.ZJH AS B1ZJH, B1.RWH AS B1RWH, B1.BB AS B1BB, B1.CKH AS B1CKH, B1.RWMS AS B1RWMS, B1.SYX AS B1SYX, B1.CKWJ AS B1CKWJ, B1.GZLX AS B1GZLX, B1.XMLX AS B1XMLX, B1.IS_BJ AS B1IS_BJ, B1.ALI AS B1ALI, B1.JHGS_RS AS B1JHGS_RS, B1.JHGS_XSS AS B1JHGS_XSS, B1.GKBH AS B1GKBH, B1.JSGS AS B1JSGS, B1.IS_HDWZ AS B1IS_HDWZ, B1.BZ AS B1BZ, B1.ZT AS B1ZT, B1.F_BBID AS B1F_BBID, B1.B_BBID AS B1B_BBID, B1.ZDBMID AS B1ZDBMID, B1.ZDRID AS B1ZDRID, B1.ZDSJ AS B1ZDSJ, B1.YXBS AS B1YXBS, B1.EOBH AS B1EOBH, D1.ZJH AS D1ZJH,D1.ZWMS AS D1ZWMS,D1.YWMS AS D1YWMS FROM B_G2_011 B0 LEFT JOIN B_G2_012 B1 ON B0.JX = B1.JX AND B0.WXFABH = B1.WXFABH AND B0.DPRTCODE = B1.DPRTCODE AND B0.BB >= B1.BB AND B1.B_BBID IS NULL LEFT JOIN D_005 D1 ON B1.ZJH = D1.ZJH AND B1.DPRTCODE = D1.DPRTCODE AND D1.ZT = 1 WHERE B0.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY D1.ZJH, B1.RWH

SELECT
FROM B_G2_011 B1 INNER JOIN B_G2_011 SELF ON SELF.JX = B1.JX AND SELF.WXFABH = B1.WXFABH AND SELF.DPRTCODE = B1.DPRTCODE WHERE SELF.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY B1.BB DESC

select
from B_G2_011 b1 left join t_user zdr on b1.zdrid = zdr.id left join t_user shr on b1.shrid = shr.id left join t_user pfr on b1.pfrid = pfr.id left join t_user sxr on b1.sxrid = sxr.id left join b_g_003 b2 on b1.id = b2.zlid left join b_g2_001 b3 on b2.pgdid = b3.id where b1.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update b_g2_012 set gkbh = (select gkh from b_g2_013 g2013 where g2013.zt = 7 and g2013.zxbs = 2 and g2013.jx = b_g2_012.jx and g2013.wxxmbh = b_g2_012.rwh and rownum = 1 ) where dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yxbs = 1 and zt = 1 and b_bbid is null and jx = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and wxfabh = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update
B_S2_002 T
B_S2_001 T
B_S2_004 T
set SKBS = (select case when count(T2.WXXMLX) = 0 then 0 else 1 end SKBS from B_G2_01102 T1 join B_G2_012 T2 on T1.WXXMID = T2.ID and T1.MAINID = #{wxfaid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and T2.WXXMLX = 2 left join B_G2_01203 T3 on T2.ID = T3.MAINID join B_G2_01204 T4 on T4.MAINID = T2.ID where 1 = 1 and T2.YXBS = 1 and T2.DPRTCODE = T.DPRTCODE and T2.JX = T.JX and (T3.FJZCH = T.FJZCH or T2.SYX = '00000') and T4.BJH = T.BJH), SSBS = (select case when count(T2.WXXMLX) = 0 then 0 else 1 end SSBS from B_G2_01102 T1 join B_G2_012 T2 on T1.WXXMID = T2.ID and T1.MAINID = #{wxfaid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and T2.WXXMLX = 3 left join B_G2_01203 T3 on T2.ID = T3.MAINID join B_G2_01204 T4 on T4.MAINID = T2.ID where 1 = 1 and T2.YXBS = 1 and T2.DPRTCODE = T.DPRTCODE and T2.JX = T.JX and (T3.FJZCH = T.FJZCH or T2.SYX = '00000') and T4.BJH = T.BJH) where T.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and T.JX = #{fjjx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and T.XLH is not null
